ack.p: We would like to thank the Zimbabwe Ministry of Health and Child Care and the Zimbabwe National Family Planning Council for support and collaboration in carrying out the evaluation, the study participants for sharing their time and invaluable perspectives. We would also like to thank the interviewers and other CHAI Zimbabwe staff that provided coordination and logistical support to this work, in particular: Mwaonedza Mushango (the late), Nisbert Teshe, Yemurai Katanda, Alison Erlwanger, Tinashe Sabiti, Euclidita Gurupira, and Tatenda Mudehwe.
